option.value: {"/Users/user/Develop/testingWithGenAI/genai-testing-demo":"{\"/src/main/java/com/moji/genaitestingdemo/exception/GlobalExceptionHandler.java\":\"This file contains a single class and one function:\\n\\n`GlobalExceptionHandler`: A class that provides a global exception handling mechanism for the application.\\n\\n`handleRuntimeException`: A function that handles `RuntimeException` exceptions and returns a `ResponseEntity` with an error message and an `INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR` status.\\n\\nThis file is responsible for handling global exceptions in the application. When a `RuntimeException` is thrown, the `handleRuntimeException` function will be called, and it will return a JSON response with the exception message and an `INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR` status.\",\"/src/test/java/com/moji/genaitestingdemo/service/AIContentServiceTest.java\":\"This file contains a unit test for the `AIContentService` class, which is responsible for generating content using the OpenAI API.\\n\\n`AIContentServiceTest`: A test class that verifies the behavior of the `AIContentService` class.\\n\\n`shouldGenerateContentSuccessfully`: A test method that verifies the successful generation of content using the OpenAI API.\\n\\n`shouldThrowExceptionWhenApiCallFails`: A test method that verifies the handling of exceptions when the OpenAI API call fails.\",\"/src/main/java/com/moji/GenaiTestingDemoApplication.java\":\"This file is a Spring Boot application class that serves as the entry point for the GenaiTestingDemoApplication. It does not contain any classes or functions, but rather sets up the Spring Boot application and runs it.\\n\\n`GenaiTestingDemoApplication`: This is the main Spring Boot application class that bootstraps the application and starts the Spring context.\\n\\n`main(String[] args)`: This is the main method that is executed when the application is started, and it calls the `run()` method of the `SpringApplication` class to start the Spring Boot application.\",\"/build/reports/problems/problems-report.html\":\"This file appears to be a JavaScript module that provides functionality for generating a configuration cache report. It does not contain any classes or functions, but rather defines a single function `configurationCacheProblems()` that returns the report data. The file also includes a large amount of code that appears to be related to the Kotlin programming language, which is likely used to provide the underlying functionality for the report generation.\",\"/src/main/java/com/moji/genaitestingdemo/dto/ContentRequest.java\":\"This file contains a single class:\\n\\n`ContentRequest`: A data transfer object (DTO) that represents a request for content, containing a `prompt` field.\\n\\nThis file does not contain any functions. It serves as a simple DTO to encapsulate the necessary information for a content request.\",\"/src/main/java/com/moji/genaitestingdemo/dto/ContentResponse.java\":\"This file contains a single class:\\n\\n`ContentResponse`: A data transfer object (DTO) that represents the response from a content generation service, containing the generated content and the prompt used.\\n\\nThis file does not contain any functions. It is a simple DTO class used to encapsulate the data returned from a content generation service.\",\"/src/main/java/com/moji/genaitestingdemo/service/AIContentService.java\":\"This file contains a single class and one function:\\n\\n`AIContentService`: A service class that generates text content using the OpenAI API.\\n\\n`generateContent`: Generates text content based on a given prompt using the OpenAI API.\\n\\nThe file provides a service for generating text content using the OpenAI API. The service class `AIContentService` has a single method `generateContent` that takes a prompt as input and returns the generated text content.\",\"/src/main/java/com/moji/genaitestingdemo/controller/ContentController.java\":\"This file is a Spring Boot controller class that handles requests to generate content using an AI service.\\n\\n`ContentController`: This class is a REST controller that exposes an endpoint to generate content based on a user-provided prompt.\\n\\n`generateContent`: This function takes a `ContentRequest` object, which contains the prompt, and uses the `AIContentService` to generate the content. It then returns a `ContentResponse` object, which contains the generated content and the prompt used.\",\"/src/test/java/com/moji/genaitestingdemo/controller/ContentControllerTest.java\":\"This file contains a test suite for the `ContentController` class, which is responsible for handling requests related to generating content using an AI service.\\n\\n`ContentControllerTest`: A test class that verifies the behavior of the `ContentController` class.\\n\\n`shouldGenerateContentSuccessfully`: A test method that checks if the `ContentController` can successfully generate content when a valid request is made.\\n\\n`shouldReturn500WhenServiceFails`: A test method that checks if the `ContentController` returns a 500 Internal Server Error response when the underlying AI service fails.\",\"/src/main/java/com/moji/genaitestingdemo/config/OpenAIConfig.java\":\"This file is a Spring Boot configuration class that sets up an OpenAI service for use in the application.\\n\\n`OpenAIConfig`: This class configures the OpenAI service by providing the API key and setting the timeout duration.\\n\\n`openAiService()`: This function creates an instance of the `OpenAiService` class using the provided API key and timeout duration.\"}"}
